BasicAnchor

class pyrit.geometry.BasicAnchor(value)

Bases: Enum

Basic anchors for Geo.

They determine on which point the origin is set. Possible choices are SOUTH, EAST, NORTH, WEST, SOUTH_WEST, SOUTH_EAST, NORTH_WEST, NORTH_EAST and CENTER.

Attributes

SOUTH

EAST

NORTH

WEST

SOUTH_WEST

SOUTH_EAST

NORTH_WEST

NORTH_EAST

CENTER
